name: POINTS
description: POINTS is a memecoin deployed on the Hyperliquid blockchain as a joke in the aftermath of the announcement of a second season of points. POINTS has no deployer allocation and was deployed with 20% of supply committed permanently to the Hyperliquidity order book module. POINTS was airdropped to holders of HFUN and PURR. A large holder of HFUN received 10% of supply as a result, but dumped it within days to near 0 due to unfounded concerns around its deployment. The token's image is inspired by their profile picture as a result.
